1370: Heylewigis moved to Verckens merct.A.4 after marriage.
Got married to Gheuardus at age 17 in 1370.
Gave birth to Guido in 1370 at age 17.
1373: Gave birth to Soeten in 1373 at age 20.
1374: Gave birth to Geile in 1374 at age 21.
1380: Gave birth to Folqui in 1380 at age 27.
1381: Lost daughter Folqui when Folqui was 2 years old.
1383: Gave birth to Ioris in 1383 at age 30.
1386: Gave birth to Geykonis in 1386 at age 33.
1389: Gave birth to Jurre in 1389 at age 36.
1390: Gave birth to Moerseil in 1390 at age 37.
1392: Lost daughter Geile when Geile was 18 years old.
1393: Gave birth to Itsburgis in 1393 at age 40.
1395: Lost daughter Itsburgis when Itsburgis was 3 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1396: Lost son Jurre when Jurre was 8 years old.
